title: Sasheer is Sitsheer
description:
Isn’t today a nice day? This week we discuss Nicole’s chunky highlights, why parties are hard and the nightmare one induced in Sasheer, Justin Timberlake’s bad impression of Rihanna’s mother, Postmates' “bottom-friendly” menu, and honoring the troops with your ass.  They take a quiz to see what kind of friendship they have, and answer listener questions about chairs (and debut our new chair segment!), being sick of hearing your friend complain about being in love with a married man, and what to do when your best friend gets married without telling you. 

 

Here is the quiz we took: https://www.buzzfeed.com/angelicaamartinez/friendship-test

 

Email or call Nicole & Sasheer with your friendship questions at:

nicoleandsasheer@gmail.com

424-645-7003
author: fanmail+bestfriends@earwolf.com (Earwolf)
